item.title: What is stack and heap
item.author: martinlwx@163.com (MartinLwx)
item.description: Intro If you’ve been using dynamic languages like Python, Javascript, etc., you probably won’t notice the difference between stack and heap. Because these languages have garbage collectors (GCs) that will automatically manage memory for you, you just need to program at a high level without considering the details. The bad news is that GC is not a cost-free design. No matter how well designed a GC algorithm is, the performance of the code will be degraded to some extent.
